description:
The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister and Big Mom loses her wits!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hashire Sanji: SOS! Germa Double Six
اهرب يا سانجي! نداء استغاثة! جيرما 66
走れサンジ SOS! ジェルマ66[ダブルシックス]
